channel.title: Whonix KVM 16.0.5.3 - Point Release!
channel.description:
This is a cumulative release with emergency security updates. For changelogs see the last three equivalent posts with are identical changes:
https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-16-0-5-3-for-virtualbox-point-release/13817
https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-16-0-5-0-for-virtualbox-point-release/13741
https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-16-0-4-2-for-virtualbox-point-release/13358
***
Download here:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Download_Whonix_%E2%84%A2
***
The Kicksecure release is now live on its respective site **kicksecure.com** and will not be discussed or announced here in the future, but it is implied that updates to both projects happen in lockstep:
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/KVM#Download_Kicksecure

item.title: Whonix KVM 16.0.5.3 - Point Release!
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
This is a cumulative release with emergency security updates. For changelogs see the last three equivalent posts with are identical changes:

Whonix 16.0.5.3 - for VirtualBox - Point Release! News
Whonix for VirtualBox Download Whonix for VirtualBox: This is a point release. Major Changes updated deb.torproject.org signing key → Tor integration in Whonix - #23 by Patrick tor 0.4.7.8 security fix → Tor integration in Whonix - #24 by Patrick Tor Browser 11.0.14 → Tor Browser Integration - #15 by Patrick Removed all unicode from project source code in preparation for future automated safeguards for Detecting Malicious Unicode in Source Code and Pull Requests. Upgrade Altern…
Whonix 16.0.5.0 - for VirtualBox - Point Release! News
Whonix for VirtualBox Download Whonix for VirtualBox: This is a point release. Major Changes Whonix-Gateway updated Tor to version 0.4.7.7 install tor-ctrl by @nyxnor by default Tor drop-in config snipppet /etc/torrc.d/*.conf and /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/*.conf Tor Control Panel / Anon Connection Wizard: updated default built-in bridges (source: Tor Browser) Whonix-Workstation updated Tor Browser to version 11.0.13 updated Monero to version 0.17.3.2 improved Whonix Welcome Page r…
Whonix 16.0.4.2 - for VirtualBox - Point Release! News
Whonix for VirtualBox Download Whonix for VirtualBox: This is a point release. Major Changes install tor-ctrl by running sudo apt install tor-ctrl (in Whonix) (discussion) (edited) (will be installed by default in next Whonix point release) tor-ctrl tor-ctrl-circuit tor-ctrl-onion tor-ctrl-stream Canning Thunderbird's startpage fix Tor Browser 11.06 - New Identity function error message fix onion-grater-remove gateway command updated LKRG (Linux Kernel Runtime Guard) updated Hard…

Download here:

Whonix – 20 Jun 22

Whonix ™ for KVM

Using Whonix ™ with KVM (Kernel Virtual Machine)

The Kicksecure release is now live on its respective site kicksecure.com and will not be discussed or announced here in the future, but it is implied that updates to both projects happen in lockstep:

https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/KVM#Download_Kicksecure

Read full topic
